mainContent: As-requested consulting engineering services for municipalities and special Districts to review subdivision and development proposals and Plans on their behalf, and in accordance with local criteria, codes and standards.

Development proposals typically include infrastructure that will be taken over by the municipality or special District upon completion of construction, such as sewer, water, storm drainage, irrigation, streets and alleys.

Reviews are based not only on standard engineering criteria, but also consider safe and convenient utility access for inspection and maintenance, traffic flow and signage, snow removal, and emergency vehicle access.
